text: Morten Lindberg (23 September 1965 â€“ 26 March 2019), also known as "Master Fatman", was a Danish media personality, comedian, disc jockey, movie director, and singer. He was born in Munkebo, Funen. In 1992, Lindberg directed his first movie, the short movie Gayniggers from Outer Space. In 2006, Master Fatman competed in the 3rd season of the popular contest Vild Med Dans on TV2. Lindberg died on 26 March 2019, aged 53. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Comedians Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish singers Category:Danish movie directors
title: Master Fatman
